name: women-pioneers-stem
description: A digital resource celebrating women pioneers in STEM to inspire girls and young women

scripts.deploy: echo 'Push to main branch to deploy to GitHub Pages'
scripts.add-pioneer: echo 'Add new pioneer to js/pioneers/ directory'
scripts.check-images: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const index = require('./js/pioneers/index.json'); const pioneers = index.pioneers.map(p => require('./js/pioneers/' + p.filename)); pioneers.forEach(p => { if (p.photo && !p.photo.startsWith('data:') && !fs.existsSync(p.photo.replace('./', ''))) { console.error('Missing image:', p.photo); process.exit(1); } }); console.log('✅ All images exist');"
scripts.check-temp-files: find . -name "*.temp" -o -name "temp-*" -o -name "*backup*" | grep -q . && (echo "❌ Found temporary files" && find . -name "*.temp" -o -name "temp-*" -o -name "*backup*" && exit 1) || echo "✅ No temporary files found"
scripts.ci: npm run check-syntax && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run check-duplicates && npm run validate-data && npm run check-images && npm run check-temp-files && npm run test

author: Women Pioneers in STEM Project
